sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import IRestaurante from '../../interfaces/IRestaurante' import { Button, Paper, Table, TableBody, TableCell, TableContainer, TableHead, TableRow } from '@mui/material' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' export default function AdminRestaurantes() { const [restaurantes, setRestaurantes] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:8000/api/v2/restaurantes/') .then(res => setRestaurantes(res.data)) }) return ( Nome Editar Excluir {restaurantes.map(rest => {rest.nome} [ editar ] )}
) }
